duties_responsibilities.duty: Simplify the purchase and set up of home utilities such as Cable TV, Satellite TV, Internet, Phone, etc.
Receive inbound phone calls from new customers and determine customer needs.
Provide a white glove experience from start to finish and deliver maximum value when bundling products and services.
Demonstrate a competitive and collaborative attitude to meet team and department goals.
Take accountability, develop a growth mindset, and exhibit resilience to succeed on a competitive sales floor.

education_certification.credential: High school degree or GED equivalent
